Congratulations Alloran, you're my first victim. But since the Alliance is =
helping the Maximals and Megaton is helping the Maximals then it's true wha=
t they say about "Friendly fire"

It isn't very friendly.

Megaton Shakes a=
s missles send him sliding across the ground. The Mutants Plasma based Mech=
 fluid starting th flow like blood. His wounds are soon cauterised by a tor=
rent of lightning striking his T-Rex body. The mutant laughs as the electri=
city gives him strength. The Maximal DNA from the elemental dragon doing it=
's job. 

The dripping Mech fluid attracted an unwanted pest as BatBreast s=
inks it's fangs into (wherever he bit him.) Megaton transforms back to drag=
on form pushing the parasite off. "You annoying little tick." he swings his=
 tail around trying to swat Hellbat and Batbreast, while sending a wave of =
flame at Hurricane, and Banzaitron.

Megatons mech fluid carried Veratis' v=
irus, the reason for the mutants warped transformations, there was no telli=
ng what the now mutated virus would do to a normal bot.
  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent=
: Sunday, April 01, 2001 7:31 PM
  Subject: WAR!!!


  :::The Protectrons/T=
orca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
  Lynx/Orion/Hun-Grr/Cyclonus/Scourge/Fracas/Wh=
eeljack/Banzai-Tron/Hurricane/Hel 

  lbat/Batbreast::: 

  ::My Maximals s=
ee the battle going on.  They look for Targets:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Brainstorm f=
ires 2 photon charges from each gun at Rippersnapper:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Chrome=
dome fires 25 rapid laser blasts from each gun at Razorclaw:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  :=
:Hardhead fires 25 crystal shards from each gun at Rampage:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::=
Highbrow fires a stream of acid from each gun at Divebomb:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::T=
orca switches his dorsal gun to nail gun and fires 25 nails at Sinnertwin::=
 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Ratchet fires 2 tusk missles and 15 shots from each blaster =
at Tantrum:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sideswipe fires 25 shots and 2 missles at Headst=
rong:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from each gun at FireBlade:: =

  ~~~~~ 
  ::Orion looked to Hun-Grr:: 
  Orion: Hey there ugly, ya wanna =
piece of me? 
  Hun-grr: No, Hun-grr want whole thing! 
  ::They fire at ea=
ch other:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Cyclonus and Scourge arrive at the CF:: 
  ~~~~~ 
=
  ::Cyclonus fires 25 rapid laser blasts at Prowl:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  Scourge: Fr=
acas! 
  ::Fracas deploys, and Scourge fires 2 missles from Fracas at Grimm=
ler:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::My Alliance members reach the CF.  Wheeljack reports to=
 Zardus:: 
  Wheeljack: I have arrived Zardus.  Do you have any orders for =
me? 
  ::The others immeadiately find their target:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Banzai-T=
ron fires 2 missles at Megaton:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Hurricane fires 15 lightning=
 bolts at Megaton:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  Hellbat: Batbreast, attack! 
  ::Batbreast =
deploys and tries to suck Megaton's mech fluid::
